ygData.subject: The Alliance's Tactical Retreat
ygData.msgSnippet: The Oblitercons/BH/Blastrage/Serpentor/Punch/Zergling/Unitron: Dark One strafed the Ark with a missile, transforming to robot mode and landing on the ground,

Subject: The Alliance's Tactical Retreat
Message-ID: <8nfmk8+pjb8@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

From: "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@...>

The Oblitercons/BH/Blastrage/Serpentor/Punch/Zergling/Unitron:





Dark One strafed the Ark with a missile, transforming to robot mode 
and landing on the ground, plasma rifle in hand.  He awaited his 
fellow Oblitercons.

---

Unitron fired off 25 rapid laser blasts into what was left of the 
repaired hull plating of the Ark.

---

Breakdown fired off a grenade at Ratchet's chest, running backwards 
for Dark One.

---

Pyro headed for Dark One, weapon at the ready.

---

Hiss headed for Dark One, saving his last rocket.

---

Scavenger limped over to Dark One.

---

Blastrage and BH decided to provide cover fire, the skimmer firing 
off three grenades at the hull of the Ark.

------

Serpentor sidestepped, the explosion of Rodimus Prime's rocket 
sending him flying to the side, slamming into a wall, Serpentor 
returning fire at Rodimus with his plasma launcher.

---

Zergling looked up, shaking his head.  "You said what?" he recieved 
the transmission rom HQ.  "The leader wants us to retreat!" he yelled.

---

Punch fired off a rocket at Xiane's torso, replacing that emptied 
weapon with a plasma cannon.

---
